bullets: Developed interactive dashboards in Power BI including the OGA Consolidated Dashboard, Sales Dashboard, and Factory Security Readiness Report, aiding executive decision-making.
Worked with Snowflake to extract, clean, and consolidate large datasets for reporting and KPI analysis.
Created and presented data-driven IA reports and management presentations for internal stakeholders and leadership.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, translate them into visual insights, and automate reporting workflows.
Worked on credit card fraud detection using Python under the guidance of NSIC professors in a professional environment.
Completed a Python course as part of the internship, concluding with a skill test score of 90+.
Worked with various Python and database tools like Pandas, PyCharm, and SQL.
